relation: Incorrect background color in right pane: gray background on white background

textAfterTable: Wrong layout for configure dialog: side pane does not have enough space kdelibs bug "xx contacts matching" message of the addressbook component added to the wrong place in the status bar not started Unable to change date range of special dates plugin not started Date in summary no longer right-aligned not started [edit] KOrganizer Small description Additional comments Status Creating all-day events does not have any effect fixed Changing month in date-picker in top-left corner: Layout is changed because of different length of month names fixed Date-picker in top-left corner: Year has semicolon (2,008 instead of 2008) fixed [edit] KMail See also the bugzilla reports, KDE4 specifc bugs can be viewed with this query Open reports with patches: Query If you are not a developer, please don't report bugs here, there is not enough space for meaningful reports; use bugs.kde.org instead.
